bs-namespacemanager-desc: Administration interface for adding, editing and deleting namespaces
bs-namespacemanager-wrong-alias: The namespace alias contains invalid characters.
bs-namespacemanager-alias-exists: The namespace alias is already set for namespace $1
bs-namespacemanager-ns-length: The namespace must have a minimum length of two characters.
bs-namespacemanager-msgnoteditabledelete: This namespace is a system namespace and cannot be deleted.
bs-namespacemanager-willmovesuffix: Will be moved into "{{int:bs-ns_main}}" with the suffix "$1"
bs-namespacemanager-deletewarning: Are you sure that you want to delete this namespace? Deleting a namespace cannot be undone.
bs-namespacemanager-deletens-movepages: This page has been moved from namespace "$1" to namespace "{{int:bs-ns_main}}", because namespace "$1" was deleted.
bs-namespacemanager-deletens-deletepages: This page has been deleted, because namespace "$1" was deleted.
log-description-bs-namespace-manager: This is a log of changes on the namespaces.
logentry-bs-namespace-manager-modify: $1 {{GENDER:$2|has changed}} the settings for the namespace $4
bs-namespacemanager-ns-config-saved: The namespace configuration has been saved.
bs-namespacemanager-error-ns-config-not-: The namespace configuration could not be saved to $1.
apihelp-bs-namespace-store-description: Lists all namespaces and arbitrary configuration. Allows sorting, filtering and pagination. Implements ExtJS Store parameters.
apihelp-bs-namespace-store-summary: Lists all namespaces and arbitrary configuration. Allows sorting, filtering and pagination. Implements ExtJS Store parameters.
apihelp-bs-namespace-tasks-description: Allows modification of the namespace configuration.
apihelp-bs-namespace-tasks-summary: Allows modification of the namespace configuration.
right-namespacemanager-viewspecialpage: Grants access to the special page [[Special:NamespaceManager]].
